summary: 20th Century Studios is an American movie studio now owned by Disney. It was formed in 1935 and was one of Hollywood's biggest studios. Originally called Twentieth Century-Fox, it made many popular movies like "Star Wars," "X-Men," and "Titanic." In 2019, Disney bought the studio and changed its name to avoid confusion. Now, it's one of Disney's five live-action film studios, also releasing animated movies through its animation division.
title: 20th Century Studios
